request.:class:comment: Request's data for converting mnemonic to seed.
request.language:hint: support [en es fr it jp zhs zht]
request.useIdeographicSpace:comment: Currently, this flag is valid only the language is set "jp".

response.:class:comment: Response data of converting mnemonic to seed.
response.entropy:comment: mnemonic's entropy. This field is only set if "language" is set in the request
